title: Maharajwala
text:
Maharajwala is a village in <a href="Shahkot%2C%20India">Shahkot</a> in <a href="Jalandhar%20district">Jalandhar district</a> of <a href="Punjab%2C%20India">Punjab</a> <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">State</a>, India. It is located from sub district headquarter and from district headquarter. The village is <a href="Administration%20%28government%29">administrated</a> by <a href="Sarpanch">Sarpanch</a> an elected representative of the village.
Demography.
, The village has a total number of 157 houses and the population of 855 of which 444 are males while 411 are females. According to the report <a href="published">published</a> by <a href="Census%20India">Census India</a> in 2011, out of the total population of the village 140 people are from <a href="Scheduled%20Castes%20and%20Scheduled%20Tribes">Schedule Caste</a> and the village does not have any <a href="Scheduled%20Castes%20and%20Scheduled%20Tribes">Schedule Tribe</a> population so far.
